question: Supreme Court vacancy in 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if at least one seat on the United States Supreme Court becomes vacant between April 7 and December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official announcements from the U.S. Government. However, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Supreme Court vacancy in 2024?

question: Will 'Civil War' gross more than $23m opening weekend?
description:
This is a market on how much 'Civil War' (2024) will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/release/rl172392449/ will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (April 12 - April 14) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 'Civil War' (2024) grosses more than $23,000,000 on its 3-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Please note, this market will resolve according to the Box Office Mojo numbers under Domestic Weekend for the 3-day weekend (which typically includes Thursday's previews), regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by April 22, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

events.title: 'Civil War' Opening Weekend Box Office

question: Tesla Robotaxi unveiling delayed?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Tesla's unveiling of Robotaxi is delayed until after August 8, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market may resolve immediately upon the announcement of a delay.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Tesla and/or Elon Musk and their official representatives, however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Iran response to Israel by Friday?
description:
On April 1, 2024, it was reported Israel bombed an Iranian consulate in Syria, killing a senior commander of Iran's Revolutionary Guards Corps. Iran promised a "decisive response".

This market will resolve to “Yes” if there is an Iranian response to Israel's bombing of the Iranian consulate in Syria by April 12, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No.”

A response by Iran refers to action(s) carried out by Iran that are explicitly in response to Israel's bombing of the Iranian consulate in Syria, which may include strikes, cyber attacks, sanctions, etc.

Only responses by Iranian forces explicitly claimed by the Islamic Republic of Iran will count toward the resolution of this market. Attacks on Israel by proxy forces (i.e.  Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will not count toward the resolution of this market.

question: UConn beats Purdue by >6.5 points?
description:
This market is on whether the UConn Huskies will cover a 6.5 point spread against the Purdue Boilermakers in their NCAA Basketball Finals matchup scheduled to take place on April 8, 2024, at 9:20 PM ET. 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if UConn wins by more than 6.5 points.

This market will resolve to “No” if Purdue loses by less than 6.5 points or wins. 

If the match is postponed to a date on or before May 8, 2024, the same market conditions will apply. If the match is postponed to a date after May 8, 2024, or canceled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: X banned in Brazil before May?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the X/Twitter app is banned for download and/or use by the majority of Brazilians in Brazil by April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from the government of Brazil, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Remilio flip MAYC in April?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Redacted Remilio Babies (TEST) collection has a higher floor price than the Mutant Ape Yacht Club (MAYC) collection for at least one continuous hour between April 7, 2024, 11:59 PM ET and April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be Blur's chart for each NFT, specifically the red line for 30-day sales, for the dates within this market's range (Redacted Remilio Babies: https://blur.io/collection/remilio-babies, MAYC: https://blur.io/collection/mutant-ape-yacht-club). If Blur becomes unavailable or ceases to report figures, another credible source may be used.

Note: If the hour-long period starts at e.g., April 30, 2024, 11:30 PM ET, it will still count for this market's resolution.

question: Israel ground offensive in Rafah between April 8-12?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if between April 8, 2024, 12:00 AM and April 12, 2024, 11:59 PM Palestine Standard Time (UTC +2), the New York Times or WSJ reports that Israel has initiated a ground offensive within Rafah. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Reports of small raids or special operations will not be sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes."

The resolution source of this market will be reporting from the New York Times or the Wall Street Journal.

events.title: Israel ground offensive in Rafah when?

question: Israel ground offensive in Rafah between April 13-19?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if between April 13, 2024, 12:00 AM and April 19, 2024, 11:59 PM Palestine Standard Time (UTC +2), the New York Times or WSJ reports that Israel has initiated a ground offensive within Rafah. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Reports of small raids or special operations will not be sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes."

The resolution source of this market will be reporting from the New York Times or the Wall Street Journal.

events.title: Israel ground offensive in Rafah when?

question: No Israel ground offensive in Rafah before April 19?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if by April 19, 2024, 11:59 PM Palestine Standard Time (UTC +2), the New York Times or WSJ does not report that Israel has initiated a ground offensive within Rafah. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Reports of small raids or special operations will not be sufficient to resolve this market to "No."

The resolution source of this market will be reporting from the New York Times or the Wall Street Journal.

events.title: Israel ground offensive in Rafah when?

question: FriendTech ATH volume in April?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Friend.Tech reaches an all time high in buy volume, measured in ETH, between April 8, 2024, 12:00 PM ET, and April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be https://dune.com/cryptokoryo/friendtech, specifically the graph titled "ETH VOLUME Friend.Tech Subject Buy/Sell Stats". If this data source becomes unavailable at resolution time, another resolution source will be chosen.

question: Will $WIF flip $SHIB in April?
description:
This is a market on whether the market capitalization of dogwifhat (WIF) will surpass that of Shiba Inu (SHIB) between April 1, 2024 to April 30, 2024 (inclusive), according to CoinGecko. 

This market will resolve based on CoinGecko's "historical data" section for each coin, currently available at https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/dogwifhat/historical_data and https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/shiba-inu/historical_data respectively, specifically the daily "Market Cap" data.

If, according to the resolution source, $WIF has a greater market cap than $SHIB for any day within this market's timeframe, this market will resolve to “Yes”. If the market cap of $WIF is equal to or lower than that of $SHIB for every day within this market's timeframe, then this market will resolve to “No”. This market may only resolve to "No" once the April 30 market cap data is available.

Note that only the historical data numbers will be used for the comparison of the market caps. If the URLs linking to CoinGecko's Historical Data change at any point, the new URLs will be used instead of the ones initially listed. If the resolution data for any of the relevant days remains unavailable through May 7, 2024, 12:00 AM ET, CoinMarketCap historical data will be used instead.

events.title: Will $WIF flip $SHIB in April?

question: Champions League: Arsenal vs Bayern Munich
description:
Bayern Munich and Arsenal are scheduled to play in the UEFA Champions League quarter-finals on April 9 and April 17, 2024.

This market will resolve to "Arsenal" if Arsenal advances to the semi-finals of the UEFA Champions League by winning their tie against Bayern Munich. 

This market will resolve to "Bayern" if Bayern Munich advances to the semi-finals of the UEFA Champions League by winning their tie against Arsenal. 

If the tie between Bayern Munich and Arsenal is postponed to a date before June 1, 2024, this market's timeframe will extend to the new match dates. If the tie is canceled, or postponed to a date in June or later, this market will resolve immediately to "50-50".

This market may be resolved immediately upon the completion of the second leg of the tie.

question: Justin & Hailey Bieber split in April?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Justin Bieber and/or Hailey Bieber announce their intention to legally separate or divorce by April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An announcement by April 30 of their intention to separate or divorce will be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution, regardless of whether the separation or divorce later actually occurs, or whether the actual separation or divorce occurs outside of the timeframe of this market.

The resolution source will be statements from Justin Bieber, Hailey Bieber, and/or their representatives, however a definitive consensus of credible media reporting may be considered.

question: UConn v. Purdue: Over/Under 144.5 points?
description:
This market is on whether the total points scored in the NCAA Basketball Finals matchup between the UConn Huskies and the Purdue Boilermakers, scheduled for April 8, 2024, at 9:20 PM ET, will be over or under 144.5 points.

This market will resolve to “Over” if the total points scored are more than 144.5.

It will resolve to “Under” if the total points scored are less than 144.5.

If the match is postponed to a date on or before May 8, 2024, the same market conditions apply. If the match is postponed after May 8, 2024, or canceled, the market will resolve 50-50.
